about_the_game:
Kyoki takes the concept of original goal board games and makes it more fun to play every day. Kyoki is a three mode board sport. In Kyoki the aim of the game is to clear the play area of all the coloured tiles. Whenever two tiles of the same colour touch each other, they disappear from the board. Can you grow to be exceptional at this Carrom boardgame, all and sundry can become a carrom master with football idea game play. Kids and adults can play and enjoy together.

Kyoki has Three different modes of play:

-> Puzzle mode: 160 skill test 4 different Kyoki zones

-> Infinite mode: Keep playing for as long as you can before it gets too crazy and the board fills up!

-> Infinite CRAZY mode: we took infinite mode and turned it up to 11. This time we choose which tile you play. Not for the faint-hearted!

Are you up for the challenge? For those who don't know carrom master sport, it's miles a strike and pocket game similar to billiards, or pools.

In Kyoki the aim of the game is to clear the play area of all the coloured tiles. Whenever two tiles of the same colour touch each other, they disappear from the board. Kyoki has Three different modes of play:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard 10.11
  • Processor: 2.0GHz 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 360 MB available space

name: KYOKI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel from 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 @ 3.2GHz with Quad Core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 360 MB available space

short_description: Kyoki takes the concept of original goal board games and makes it more fun to play every day. Kyoki is a three mode board sport. In Kyoki the aim of the game is to clear the play area of all the coloured tiles.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
